title: SPECIALS EIGHT (8) WEEKS FREE!
posting_body: For leasing information call or text
Lease today and receive up to 8 weeks free!
Welcome - where elegant residences meet unparalleled amenities within the vibrant Regent Square district at the heart of Houston.
Experience an elevated way of life, with world-class restaurant and retail anchored by James Beard award-winning chefs and lush tree-lined sidewalks and lawns.
Designed to endlessly inspire, exhilarate, and motivate, The Sterling welcomes you to experience a comprehensive lifestyle embodying the best of cosmopolitan living.
Live, play and celebrate outdoors in our covered terrace The Piazza.
Enjoy ceiling hung cabana seating, five 70 inch TV's, ping pong, corn hole, a stunning feature island, and a feature stone-clad fireplace - all fully covered.
Work meets play in our media lounge.
En-suite conference rooms let you customize your workday and collaborate.
Play Billiards, watch one of our two 70 inch TV's or enjoy a beverage at our full bar-all while surrounded by stunning sculptures, art and a stone waterfall-sided island.
